I also called it "Temporal Stock Manager" but the whole thing is getting kind of cheesy

I don't feel like going in
Starting is always harder than doing
Plus I had changed my life
I have ADHD and I can't remember important things in life
I can only remember things when I'm prompted
If I have to remember something general in the long term, that just isn't going to happen
Now having willpower actually drains your mental stamina
Apparently successful people actually don't exercise it
Instead they just have things do it for them
That is the purpose of my new program

m.t: Reminds me of this wonderful image

f.d:
A close-up comic panel of Donald Duck grasping Mickey Mouse's hand with a look of desperation on his face, and Mickey smiling back at him.

Donald: "Everything that we know and love is reducible to the absurd acts of chemicals, and there is therefore no intrinsic value in this material universe."

Mickey: "Hypocrite that you are, for you trust the chemicals in your brain to tell you they are chemicals. All knowledge is ultimately based on that which we cannot prove. Will you fight? Or will you perish like a dog?"

Think of what will be useful to you, in a way of contributing towards building an achievement or a memory that you will be happier and prouder with years later. 
For example, useful media vs media you should avoid like the plague.
AEwVS, a game that left a mark on you, lead you on a different path of knowledge, coding, and self improvement, as well as made you socialize with the entire community. The game makes you feel happier as well as smarter, it created a memory in you and a wonderful inspiration for yourself for you to remember years later. Yes you didn't change the world, but you did the best you can do in this moment.
Media that is useless to you: TikTok. A machine full of colors mindless entertainment which will not teach you anything and only lower your attention span.
Please read this text, this is what I believe in. Media is useful, a lot of it you should avoid, and your intuition will attract you towards the kind you need.
